description.@en: There is one precept in all mathematics I hold dearest: the divine golden ratio of triangles that returns again and again in both nature and Man’s creations.

data.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: You automatically succeed at any Skill Test to determine distances. In addition, you treat Extreme and Long Distances as Medium Distance for purposes of using ranged weapons.
